name: TeachStreet, Inc.
description: Provider of an online community website. The company connects teachers, schools and students together. It enables learners to find classes by subject or teacher, as well as provides a public forum that helps teachers, coaches and experts to share what they know.
one_liner: Provider of an online community website. The company connects teachers, schools and students together. It enables learners to find classes by subject or teacher, as well as provides a public forum that helps teachers, coaches and experts to share what they know.
